snippet: The policy will take effect immediately, and the Scottish club said some women would be put on a fast track for membership to avoid languishing on the long waiting list.
abstract: Royal and Ancient Golf Club in St Andrews, Scotland, 260-year-old institution that calls itself the spiritual home of golf, votes overwhelmingly to admit its first female members; policy of men only had increasingly become an anachronism that cast the club in an unfavorable light with fans, golfers and tournament sponsors; it also undermined one of main mandates of the R & A, which is to expand the game.
lead_paragraph: The policy will take effect immediately, and the Scottish club said some women would be put on a fast track for membership to avoid languishing on the long waiting list.

headline.seo: Royal and Ancient Golf Club Votes to Admit Female Members
headline.main: A 260-Year-Old Shrine Unlocks Its Doors to Women
